short_summary: This request for standing offers (RFSO) cancels and supersedes previous RFSO number Doc4095600371(MA021-220134/B) dated July 13th, 2022 with a closing of July 28th, 2022 at 2:00pm EDT. Canada is seeking offers from Offerors to provide equipment and scaffold erecting services, for all scaffolding/staging equipment rentals, on an as required basis to Marine Atlantic Inc (MAI).

Canada is seeking offers from Offerors to provide equipment and scaffold erecting services, for all scaffolding/staging equipment rentals, on an as required basis to Marine Atlantic Inc (MAI).
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### MA021-220134C Scaffolding Components

### *Vendor Invitation: Request for Standing Offer*

#### [Solicitation Number]: WS3975274319

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites vendors to submit offers for the provision of scaffolding components, as per the Request for Standing Offer (RFSO).

#### Key Dates
*   Publication Date: August 16, 2023
*   Tender Closing Date: September 1, 2023, at 14:00:00
*   Expected Contract Start Date: September 1, 2023
*   Expected Contract End Date: None

#### Contact Information
*   Corporation Name: PSPC
*   Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
*   Primary Contact: Melanie Gillis (elle-la / she-her)
*   Contact Email: [melanie.gillis2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:melanie.gillis2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
*   Contact Fax: None
*   Contact Phone: None

#### Description of Goods or Services to be Procured
The PSPC is seeking to establish a standing offer contract for the provision of scaffolding and scaffold accessories on an as-as-required basis. Interested vendors may access the complete tender package on the SAP Ariba platform.

#### Special Instructions and Requirements
*   Bidders that must request a debriefing on the results of their bid should do so to the Contracting Authority within 15 working days of receiving the contract award message.
*   References and attachments can be accessed through the SAP Ariba platform.

#### Additional Information

*   Contracting Entity: PSPC
*   Contracting Entity Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
*   Regions of Delivery: Newfoundland and Labrador, Nova Scotia
*   Flag for Trade Agreements Applies
*   Goods or Services for which this Contracting Authority is solicitating: *Ladders and Scaffolding*, *Ladders and Scaffolding Accessories*, and *Rigging and Scaffolding Services*.

To view the full Request for Standing Offer, please refer to the *Vendor Invitation: Request For Standing Offer WS3975274319* link on the SAP A
